caption.center: PIERPONT v. THE STATE OF OHIO.

syllabus.italic: Supreme Court — Dismissals — No debatable constitutional

opinion.posture: ERROR to the Court of Appeals of Allen county.
opinion.attorneys:
Miss Jessie Levy and Mr. Clarence C. Miller, for plaintiff in error.
Mr. Ernest M. Botkin, prosecuting attorney, Mr. Joseph H.Flick and Mr. Benjamin S. Motter, for defendant in error.
opinion.opinion_text:
It is ordered and adjudged that said petition in error be, and the same is hereby, dismissed for the reason no debatable constitutional question is involved in said cause.
Petition in error dismissed.
WEYGANDT, C.J., STEPHENSON, MATTHIAS, BEVIS, ZIMMERMAN and WILKIN, JJ., concur.Page 573
